nasha_dashboard_loading_error: An error occurred on loading the NAS-HA information.
nasha_dashboard_update_error: An error occurred on modifying NAS-HA details.
nasha_dashboard_capacity_delay_text: Storage information is not updated in real-time.
nasha_expired: Your NAS-HA hasn't been renewed. This could be due to your own decision or a late payment on your part.
nasha_dashboard_space_usage_help: The administration contact and the technical contact will both get an email alert when the NAS reaches 90% capacity
